member.name: T:Serilog.RichTextWinFormLoggerConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extends with methods for configuring Rich Text Windows Forms logging.

member.name: M:Serilog.RichTextWinFormLoggerConfigurationExtensions.RichTextWinForm(Serilog.Configuration.LoggerSinkConfiguration,System.String,Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextTheme,Serilog.Events.LogEventLevel,System.IFormatProvider,Serilog.Core.LoggingLevelSwitch)
member.param: A message template describing the format used to write to the sink. The default is "[{Timestamp:HH:mm:ss} {Level:u3}] {Message:lj}{NewLine}{Exception}".
The richTextTheme to apply to the styled output.
The minimum level for events passed through the sink. Ignored when is specified.
Supplies culture-specific formatting information, or null.
A allowing the pass-through minimum level to be changed at runtime.

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Output.LevelOutputFormat
member.summary: Implements the {Level} element. can now have a fixed width applied to it, as well as casing rules. Width is set through formats like "u3" (uppercase three chars), "w1" (one lowercase char), or "t4" (title case four chars).

member.name: T:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle
member.summary: Elements styled by a console theme.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle.Text
member.summary: Prominent text, generally content within an event's message.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle.SecondaryText
member.summary: Boilerplate text, for example items specified in an output template.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle.TertiaryText
member.summary: De-emphasized text, for example literal text in output templates and punctuation used when writing structured data.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle.Invalid
member.summary: Output demonstrating some kind of configuration issue, e.g. an invalid message template token.

member.name: F:Serilog.Sinks.RichTextWinForm.Themes.RichTextThemeStyle.Scalar
member.summary: All other scalar values, e.g. instances.
